revision.comment: /* DECORATE definition */ Updated -- and with that I think I'm done :)
revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Dynamic light | name = Colored Vavoom light | class = VavoomLightColor | doomednum = 1503 | game = OpenGL }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:DynamicLight|DynamicLight]]→[[Classes:VavoomLight|VavoomLight]]→VavoomLightColor
A colored light takes four arguments: :''1'': Intensity value of the light :''2'': Red value of the light :''3'': Green value of the light :''4'': Blue value of the light A colored light's Z position is absolute, instead of being relative to the floor like all other map objects. All dynamic lights can be toggled on and off with [[Thing_Activate]] and [[Thing_Deactivate]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR VavoomLightColor : {{Class|VavoomLight}} native {}
